about.details:
Incorporated in 2018, RO Jewels is engaged in the wholesale business of Silver and Gold chains. It is an Ahmedabad based business to sell gold/silver necklaces, bars, bracelets, and chains. RO Jewels acquired M/s Ravi Ornaments dated 18th Dec 2019.

The company purchases the readymade jewelry from the independent wholesalers and manufacturers across Mumbai and Ahmedabad. It has a showroom at Manek Chowk, Ahmedabad to sell the products. Apart from this, the company also sells products to other jewelry stores through B2B marketing strategy.

The Jewelry portfolio of the company includes Indo-western, traditional, and modern jewelry. All the jewelry offered by RO Jewels has BIS Hallmark (widely accepted mark of purity of gold).

Competitive Strength

1. Established brand name in the local market
2. The long term strong business relationships

faqs.question: What is the RO Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer:
RO Jewels IPO is a SME IPO of 1365000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.91 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 12, 2020, and closes on March 17, 2020.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in RO Jewels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in RO Jewels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in RO Jewels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in RO Jewels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'RO Jewels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When RO Jewels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The RO Jewels IPO opens on March 12, 2020 and closes on March 17, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of RO Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: RO Jewels IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for RO Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in RO Jewels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is RO Jewels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for RO Jewels IPO will be done on Friday, March 20, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, March 24, 2020. Check the RO Jewels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is RO Jewels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The RO Jewels IPO listing date is on Wednesday, March 25, 2020.
